meanings.sent1: The swarthiest man in the village had a deep tan from working under the sun.
meanings.sent2: She returned from her beach vacation looking swarthiest among her friends.
meanings.sent3: The swarthiest person at the costume party accidentally got mistaken for a pirate!
meanings.sent4: The old leather jacket had taken on the swarthiest hue after years of use.
meanings.sent5: The swarthiest shadows of the forest made it seem like a mysterious place.

meanings.definition: Having a dark or dusky appearance.
meanings.sent1: The swarthiest clouds signaled an impending storm.
meanings.sent2: The room was dimly lit, making the corners appear swarthiest.
meanings.sent3: The swarthiest cat in the litter always seemed to be up to mischief.
meanings.sent4: Her mood turned as swarthiest as the evening sky.
meanings.sent5: The swarthiest alley in town was known for its eerie atmosphere.
